text: Gernicourt is a former commune. It is found in the region Hauts-de-France in the Aisne department in the north of France. Previously part of the Aisne department, it was merged on 1 January 2017 into the commune Cormicy, in Marne.Arrêté préfectoral 31 December 2016 == References == Category:Former communes in Aisne
title: Gernicourt
